titles.title: Military Academy Honor and Conduct Act
Military Academy Honor and Conduct Act
To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to the congressional defense committees a report on the honor codes and related adjudicatory processes of the Service Academies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Academy Honor and Conduct Act
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to update the 1995 report titled Department of Defense Service Academies: Comparison of Honor and Conduct Adjudicatory Processes, including to compare the honor and conduct systems at each service academy (i.e., the U.S. Military Academy, the U.S. Naval Academy, and the U.S. Air Force Academy).
